title: Focus on wonderland
creator_credit: Hawley Lawrence, Russ McCaig, Steve Bridge and FilmFair
brief_description: A couple spend a day in Los Angeles visiting movie lots, shops, markets and the beach. Later they visit the famed night spots of the city. Without commentary, this film uses natural sound and popular music.
creator_credit_for_label: Hawley Lawrence, Russ McCaig, Steve Bridge and FilmFair
